outputs.output_descr:
The project is aimed at the elaboration of an Integral and Sustainable National Policy on Citizen Security and Social Peace Promotion POLSEPAZ as its Spanish acronyms- is a policy instrument aimed to guide the actions of the Costa Rican State on citizen security and peace promotion matter. Its development is based in the human development approach and derived approaches as rights, gender and youth focus. It supports the validity of human rights, rule of law and democracy. It is a policy which proposes a short, medium and long term actions for a ten years period. 
POLSEPAZ will be developed taking into account the results of a consultation process made at national level as well as recent trends in insecurity's key indicators in the country, international experiences and experts' contributions.

project_descr: Política Integral y Sostenible de Seguridad Ciudadana y Promoción de la Paz
project_title: Política Integral y Sostenible de Seguridad Ciudadana y
